description.en: Through our Method NFT Vaults, Liquidity Providers can stake liquidity to their NFT, which then proves they are providing liquidity and should earn rewards, without needing to stake directly into a protocol’s smart contract. This makes it a win-win for legitimate providers and protocols, while increasing confidence in the DeFi ecosystem.
